About.paragraph: To create simple tools for the identification and registration of every pet in the world to solve issues with lost and homeless pets, illegal puppy trade, and improve pets' care.We are going to become the main voice of animal rights and raise the standards of treatment toward our four-legged friends to a higher level. We work hard to provide you with the best services to help keep your pets safe and healthy.

Services.name: Pet's Medical History
Services.text: It's common to forget illnesses that our pets had, or forget the medecines that they took, or the vaccines he did and when. Petoo provides a secure platform where you can save ll your pet medical history

Services.name: Veterinaries
Services.text: In Tunisia, finding the contact of a local vet is'nt easy. Find in Petoo a reliable contact list a veterinaries across the contry within a click

Services.name: Appointment
Services.text: Going through the procees of calling of vet and booking an appointment is annoying at time, use Petoo to book your your pets appointment online anytime , anywhere

Services.name: Pet Store
Services.text: finding a good pet store ois challenging at times. With Petoo acces to diffrent pet store, where you can purshase your pets necessities, with home delivery.

Services.name: Blog
Services.text: It's hard to take care of our pets, sometimes we get lost. Petoo privides a blog with daily new content of tips and tricks for providing the best life for your pet

Services.name: Gallerey
Services.text: we love our pats and take daily pictures of them for souvenirs. Petoo provides you with an online gallery where yu can save all your pets photos and save space on your phone

Testimonials.text: "I used to loose my pets' paper medical history book all the time, as i'm a bit messy. now a have an online platform where i can save everythings."
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "forgetting all pet's papers at home is smth i constantly do whenever i take him to a vet appointment. with petoo i have all his medical history online i can access it any time, even the vet can check it online directly. "
Testimonials.name: Salem Djou

Testimonials.text: " i hate shopping. it's very very nice to have an online store with diffrent pet shops."
Testimonials.name: Ahmed helmi

Testimonials.text: "i useed to go to this very expensive vet a year go just because i didn't have any other option. Finally i have a access to a large vet contact list."
Testimonials.name: Salma Aouicha

Testimonials.text: "i Had my first pet a year , and taking care og him was harder than i expected. at least i have daily short tips and tricks from Petoo to help me"
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "My husband and i have about 5 pets. They're like our children and it's important to us to give the the best life. Having Petoo have been a great help!"
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe
